page.title: 15BASILDON NE: ITEC
page.content: The{Information Technology Centre}is one of 163 government sponsored centres throughout the country. It is based in an old school building. Part of its function is to run Youth Training Scheme courses in computers and micro-electronics which will count towards City and Guild examinations in the future. Word processing, use of computer software, programming and robotics are taught. It will eventually become a business in its own right by developing and producing marketable goods. The ITEC has an{open access}policy with local companies and the community. ITEC trainees spend time working in local companies to gain work experience. A weekly family computer club is run to show people what computers are capable of, and to help them learn how to operate them.
